item.title: Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services V2.0.0 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services V2.0.0 Please welcome a new release of Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services V2.0.0. Major Features Aspose.Cells for Reporting Services Report Designer optimization. Other Improvements and Changes New Features (SSRS-40147) Dynamic Formula to sum table column (SSRS-40144) Configuring Report Servers to store/cache the report server data (SSRS-40142) Support Shared DataSets (SSRS-40113) Negative Values in perantheses (SSRS-40103) Aspose.
